name: Test Collaboration Contract
desc: This contract is pretty cool.
content: The monster level is set to 10 in the Test Text.

name: Difficulty Lv. 30
content: Set the initial difficulty of the Stage to <style=red>30</style>.

name: Level Contract 40
desc: This contract is pretty cool.
content: The monster level is set to 10 in the Test Text.

name: Level Contract 50
desc: This contract is pretty cool.
content: The monster level is set to 10 in the Test Text.

name: Elite Squad
desc: "We just need to outsmart them!"
content: Enemy ATK and DEF are both increased by <style=red>12%</style>.

name: Heavy Shield
desc: Heavy armor suits them well as their graves.
content: Enemies take <style=red>20%</style> less damage.

name: Lethal Threat
desc: "Even the strongest attack… is pointless if it misses!"
content: Increases enemy DMG by <style=red>30%</style>.

name: Healing Reduction
desc: "Just take out your foes before they even get a chance to harm you."
content: Reduces healing received by allies by <style=red>35%</style>.
editor_name: 我方受到治疗效果降低35%

name: Healing Reduction
desc: "Let's just swap the potions for more arrows!"
content: Reduces healing received by allies by <style=red>70%</style>.
editor_name: 我方受到治疗效果降低70%

name: Full Team Return
desc: "If you want to hurt my allies, you'll have to get past this shield first!"
content: No one was defeated.

name: Limited Support
desc: I have faith in the power of my allies!
content: Disables Intermediate and Advanced Tactical Skills.

name: Fight to the Last Breath
desc: The enemies seem more stubborn than tenacious.
content: Enemies gain [<style=C4>Resolve</style>], [<style=C4>Toughness</style>], and Knockback Immunity, and increase <style=green>20%</style> of HP.
editor_name: 敌方获得[不屈]、[强韧]， 最大生命值提高20%，且免疫击退

name: Final Gift
desc: "Whoa! Are those the curtain call fireworks?"
content: Enemies explode upon defeat, dealing <style=red>80% of</style> Physical DMG to all the nearby enemies within a <style=red>1</style>-circle radius.
editor_name: 所有敌方角色会在死后自爆，对2格内的敌方单位造成0.8倍物理伤害

name: Solid
desc: "Do these folks even know what pain is?"
content: Enemies gain [<style=C4>Toughness</style>].

name: Magic Defense
desc: "Th-this isn't fair to us!"
content: Reduces enemy Magical DMG taken by <style=purple>40%</style> and Percentage DMG taken by <style=red>50%</style>.
editor_name: 敌方受到魔法伤害降低50%

name: Racing Against the Clock
desc: "Come at me together and don't delay my clock-out!"
content: Clear the stage within <style=red>10</style> rounds.

name: Outnumbered by the Enemy
desc: This is hardly a surprise.
content: The Union's Elite Forces join the battle.

name: The Rock in the Army
desc: "I'll provide the same sense of security for everyone!"
content: With Teadon deployed, all enemies gain a [<style=red>Physical Shield</style>] equal to <style=C4>30%</style> of their Max HP at the start of the battle. If the enemy has no [Shield] at the start of their action, they gain a Physical Shield equal to <style=red>10%</style> of their max HP, otherwise, increases their DMG dealt by <style=red>20%</style>, and their DEF by <style=red>30%</style>.

name: The Power of Heroines
desc: "Let me learn from Gloria's charismatic influence!"
content: Gloria's Aura expands across the entire battlefield, increasing HP by <style=green>25%</style>; all enemies deal <style=red>30%</style> more damage and gain <style=green>30%</style> of Life Steal.
editor_name: 歌洛莉亚强化-骑士团挑战

name: Quick Move
desc: "What a waste of speed! You could have used it to run away."
content: Enemy Movement is increased by <style=red>1</style> tile.

name: Increases ATK and DEF by 30% when there are 2 allies within 3 tiles around the enemy.
content: When surrounded by at least <style=red>2</style> enemies within <style=red>3</style> tiles, increases ATK and DEF by <style=red>30%</style>.
editor_name: 敌方3格内有2个友军攻防属性提升30%

name: Wanted Order
desc: "Times have truly changed, Safiyyah."
content: Enemies gain [Settlement of the Hanged Men]. At the end of Safiyyah's action, she casts [Safiyyah's Focus Fire Order] on the target with the lowest HP percentage, lasting for <style=red>1</style> turn.
editor_name: 索菲亚强化 集火-伊利亚挑战

name: Wanted Order
desc: "Times have truly changed, Safiyyah."
content: Increases Safiyyah's HP by <style=green>100%</style>, and she gains [Safiyyah's Coercion].
editor_name: 索菲亚强化 控制-伊利亚挑战

name: Medical Miracle
desc: "Looks like the enemy's logistics are quite reliable too."
content: Enemy healing received is increased by <style=green>30%</style>.

name: Elite Squad
desc: "The mightier the foe, the stronger our fighting spirit!"
content: Enemy ATK and DEF are both increased by <style=red>24%</style>.

name: Weeble-Wobble
desc: "Then I won't show any mercy at all."
content: Enemies gain [<style=C4>Resolve</style>]: Return to the battlefield upon defeat, with <style=green>40%</style> of HP restored.
editor_name: 敌方获得[不屈]，可回复40%生命值

name: Wrath of Judgment
desc: "Samantha is like a whole new person with the mask on."
content: The Judge Samantha enters the battlefield. Any enemy unit with more [Buffs] than its target has a <style=red>100%</style> chance to land a critical hit, ignoring <style=red>30%</style> of the target's DEF, and steals <style=red>3</style> [Buffs] from the target after the attack.
editor_name: 审判者萨曼莎出战-教皇国挑战

name: Glorious Radiance
desc: "Even so, I won't show any mercy!"
content: The Nun Samantha joins the battle, her Trait Range extending across the entire battlefield. At the end of her action, she recovers <style=green>3</style> NRG. Her healing grants the target <style=red>1</style> random [<style=C4>Level 2 Attribute Buff</style>] and dispels <style=red>2</style> Debuffs. Enemies take <style=red>40%</style> less [AoE DMG].
editor_name: 修女萨曼莎出战-教皇国挑战

name: Go for it, Convallaria!
desc: "I'm surprised by how capable you all are."
content: Maitha, Faycal, and Rawiyah gain a significant boost.

name: Flame Companion
desc: "I've already warned you not to play with fire!"
content: Enemies gain [Firewalking]. Additionally, after an enemy's single-target attack, the tiles within <style=red>1</style> tile of the target turn into [<style=C4>Burning</style>] tiles.

name: Rawiyah Enhancement - Final Challenge
content: After dealing damage, unleashes [Inertial Chop] and gains <style=red>1</style> extra stack of [<style=C4>Tipsy</style>]; increases DMG dealt by <style=red>50%</style> upon accumulating <style=red>3</style> stacks of Tipsy.

name: Faycal Enhancement - Final Challenge
content: Reduces the CD for the Guardian Sword of Convallaria to <style=red>1</style>, while making [<style=C4>Alert</style>] immune to interruption.

name: Outnumbered by the Enemy
desc: "Seems like you've got quite a pack of lackeys at your heels now."
content: Irian Elite Forces join the battle.

name: Enemy Ignores Role Counter
content: The enemy ignores Role Counter Effects.

name: Silence
desc: Initiate the backup plan!
content: Primary Tactical Skills are disabled.

name: Racing Against the Clock
desc: "Come at me together and don't delay my clock-out!"
content: Clear the stage within <style=red>12</style> rounds.

name: Takes 30% less Physical DMG when Healthy, and 30% less Magical DMG when Injured.
content: Takes <style=C4>30%</style> less Physical DMG when [<style=red>Healthy</style>], and <style=C4>30%</style> less Magical DMG when [<style=purple>Injured</style>].
editor_name: 健康时受到物理伤害降低30%，受伤时受到魔法伤害降低30%

name: The Hanged Men's Pursuit
desc: "Well, look who decided to lend a hand."
content: Safiyyah and Irian Elite Forces join the battle.
editor_name: 索菲亚和伊利亚精锐上阵

name: Rising Fire
desc: "Beryl, no more playing with fire!"
content: Transforms some tiles into burning tiles and grants enemies immunity to [<style=C4>Scorch</style>] and [<style=C4>Burning</style>] tile effects.

name: The Rock in the Army
desc: "I'll provide the same sense of security for everyone!"
content: Receives a [<style=red>Physical Shield</style>] equal to <style=C4>10%</style> of Max HP at the start of the battle. While [shielded], deals <style=red>15%</style> more DMG and takes <style=red>15%</style> less DMG.

name: Difficulty Lv. 40
content: Sets the initial difficulty level of the stage to <style=red>40</style>.

name: Difficulty Lv. 50
content: Sets the initial difficulty level of the stage to <style=red>50</style>.

name: Difficulty Lv. 60
content: Sets the initial difficulty level of the stage to <style=red>60</style>.

name: Complete Supply
desc: It's time to demonstrate the abilities of a leader.
content: Increases both ATK and DEF of allies by <style=red>50%</style>; unable to select the Challenge Topic.

name: Racing Against the Clock
desc: "Come at me together and don't delay my clock-out!"
content: Clear the stage within 8 <style=red>rounds</style>.

name: Tightened Lineup
desc: "We're just one person short. It'd be a mistake to underestimate us!"
content: Our team's deployable unit limit is reduced by 1.
editor_name: 我方可上阵人数减少一人

name: Blessing Light
desc: "I don't like those! Take them away!"
content: Summon <style=red>2</style> additional [Luxite Pillars].
editor_name: 召唤2个额外的祝福灯桩

name: Tanky
desc: "Perfect, let me throw in a few more punches!"
content: Increases enemy HP by <style=green>25%</style>.

name: Good on top of Good
desc: "Your blessings can't compare to our items!"
content: Increases Enemy's DMG dealt by <style=red>10%</style> and reduces DMG taken by <style=red>10%</style> for each [Buff] they possess, up to <style=red>30%</style>.
editor_name: 敌方每拥有1个增益造成伤害提升10%，受到伤害降低10%，最多30%。

name: Maneuver Assault
desc: "The showdown is inevitable, no matter how far you run!"
content: For every <style=red>1</style> tile traveled before attacking, increases enemy's DMG by <style=red>8%</style>.
editor_name: 敌方攻击前每移动1格，造成伤害提升8%

name: Rock-solid
desc: "I'll provide the same sense of security for everyone!"
content: At the start of the battle, all enemies gain a [<style=red>Physical Shield</style>] equal to <style=C4>20%</style> of their Max HP; if they end their action without a shield, they gain a [Physical Shield] equal to <style=red>10%</style> of their Max HP.
editor_name: 小型活动用-开战获得20%最大生命值的【物理护盾】，行动结束时若自身没有护盾，则获得10%

name: Glorious Radiance
desc: Wait, are you serious?
content: The Nun Samantha restores <style=green>3</style> NRG at the end of her action, and her healing grants the target <style=red>1</style> random [<style=C4>Level 2 Attribute Buff</style>] while dispelling <style=red>2</style> Debuffs.

name: Surprise
desc: Keep a safe distance.
content: Enemies target those with lower defense. Deals <style=red>20%</style> more Physical DMG to all enemies within <style=red>2</style> tiles at the end of the action.
editor_name: 小型活动用-伤害类型转换为目标较低防御的类型，攻击后造成伤害
